content.subheadingContent: MORE CUSHION. MORE COMFORT. MORE TERRAIN.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: This trail running fan favorite just got even better, with max cushion and our Original FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, designed for unwavering all-day comfort, no matter the terrain.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
ALL THE CUSHION YOU NEED TO PERFORM.

Whether youâ€™re piling on the miles or earning vertical feet, you have the durability and comfort you need to perform at your best and enjoy the view.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: MAXIMUM GRIP FOR MAXIMUM ADVENTURE. Hug the trails with VibramÂ® Megagrip. According to VibramÂ®, this high-performance sticky rubber offers unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces. Maintain optimal ground adaptability on dirt, rocks, or whatever else the trail throws at you.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
LOCK IN AND HEAD OUT.

The premium collar on the new Olympus 5 provides a tailored locked-in feel to keep you comfortable and balanced. Stay out there and keep moving for miles while your shoes stay put. A newly designed sidewall shows off refined style and a durable, engineered mesh upper emphasizes premium comfort for a breathable run on warm-weather days.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: A ROOMY RUN FOR ALL-DAY FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT. With our Original FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, you have the space you need to conquer the dirt. This fit gives your feet room in the toe box to spread out naturally and comfortably so you can keep running and discovering all day long.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: MORE CUSHION. MORE COMFORT. MORE TERRAIN.
